articles.title: Niger crisis deepens as European nations evacuate and coup leaders get support from other juntas - The Associated Press
articles.description: A French military transport plane carrying Europeans has departed Niger in the first such evacuation flight since mutinous soldiers ousted the country’s democratically elected president nearly a week ago and shut its borders. France, Italy and Spain all annou…
